About Me


Bio

I am a passionate and motivated software developer interested in a front end web development position. I have a Bachelors Degree in Computer Science from Clemson University. My top skills include a strong knowledge of React and Redux built on top of a solid understanding of JavaScript and ES6 syntax. I also have experience working with both large scale JavaEE backend systems as well as smaller Node.js powered applications. My drive for personal growth means I am always learning new technologies and working hard to imporove my stills every day.
